profile:
I offer great service at great rates. You can rely on me to get there fast and know your appliance is fixed properly. Most service can Also be booked in the day you call so don't hesitate, call me today!

- Owner Jeff Bolen proudly servicing Regina's in-home major appliances since 1993.
- Extensive multi-brand new parts inventory in service vehicle producing more same day repairs.
- Quality, Professional, and Honest service. I pride myself on doing an honest and proper repair and ensure the work area is clean when I leave.
- Service for most major brands of fridge, stove, washer, dryer, dishwasher, and deep-freeze.

With servicing major appliances for over 20 years I have the knowledge to quickly diagnose and repair appliances in a timely manner keeping your repair costs to a minimum.

Are you looking for the best major appliance repair company in Regina? Give me a call, you will be glad you did.

To book your service please call:
306-352-6536
306-35-BOLEN
or Email:
service@bolentech.ca

Also open Saturdays.
